title: Leaverbuster for game crashes
body: So, my game crashed 2 times, in 2 different games, i immediately reconnected and yet, i still get five 20 minute leaverbusters... cmon

replies.body: Crashing back to back sucks, I'd be happy to help if I can get some more info like any error messages.  It sounds like you were still gone long enough to get marked by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Stick to custom games for now and let me know if the crashes are still an issue.
It wasnt even back to back though, i crashed 2 minutes into one game of poro king, then again the next game at around 7
